meanings.definition: A person or thing that dispenses something, such as a vending machine.
meanings.sent1: The candy dispenser at the store gave out colorful treats.
meanings.sent2: I used the soap dispenser to wash my hands.
meanings.sent3: The dispenser of snacks was the hero of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a dispenser of happiness, spreading joy to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The dispenser hummed happily as it handed out goodies.

meanings.definition: A container or device that releases a specific amount of something, such as a soap dispenser.
meanings.sent1: The water dispenser in the office provides cool drinks.
meanings.sent2: I need to refill the tape dispenser on my desk.
meanings.sent3: The dispenser of jokes always had the office laughing.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a dispenser of wisdom, guiding us through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The candy dispenser clinked as it dropped sweets into waiting hands.

meanings.definition: A person who distributes or administers something, such as a dispenser of justice.
meanings.sent1: The nurse acted as a dispenser of medicine to the patients.
meanings.sent2: The dispenser of advice always had wise words to share.
meanings.sent3: The dispenser of compliments made everyone feel special.
meanings.sent4: Her actions were like a dispenser of kindness, touching hearts around her.
meanings.sent5: The dispenser of knowledge shared valuable insights with the students.
